rare_symbols.name: Trishul Mark
rare_symbols.meaning: Divine protection, mastery over past, present and future.

rare_symbols.name: Swastika Mark
rare_symbols.meaning: Highly auspicious karmic blessing; prosperity and divine path.

rare_symbols.name: Lotus Mark
rare_symbols.meaning: Pure soul, spiritual awakening, enlightened destiny.

rare_symbols.name: Temple Structure
rare_symbols.meaning: Indicates deep spiritual duty; carrier of ancient wisdom.

rare_symbols.name: Star of Brahma
rare_symbols.meaning: Once-in-a-lifetime mark; very high destiny; global leadership energy.

rare_symbols.name: Chain Pattern
rare_symbols.meaning: Indicates karmic entanglement; deep life lessons.

rare_symbols.name: Matsya Rekha
rare_symbols.meaning: Rare fortune symbol in Hindu palmistry; divine progress.
